name: Apotheosis of Fear
description:
This is a little story about events that are impossible to imagine becoming true.

Apotheosis 02 WIN - latest version for Windows

Inspired by Vasily Vereshchagin's painting "The Apotheosis of War" and current events.

Please learn the controls before starting the game.

Controls:

WASD - move;

E - Interaction;

Spacebar - to close the note.

Recommended system requirements:

11th Gen Intel Core  i5-11400H  2.70 GHz

16 GB RAM

RTX 3050

!SSD!
